competitors.name: SAP
competitors.notes: Enterprise ERP with public sector solutions

context: In 2010, Tyler Technologies was a leading provider of software for local government. The company grew through acquisitions including Incode (2010) for property tax and billing. Competition came from enterprise vendors like SAP and Oracle as well as specialized government software providers. The market was fragmented with many small regional vendors. Tyler focused on comprehensive solutions for courts, public safety, financials, and other local government functions.
